description:
Re-creating Neuro-sama, a container of souls of AI waifu / virtual characters to bring them into our worlds.


New Contributors
- @lockrush-dev made their first contribution in https://github.com/moeru-ai/airi/pull/946
üöÄ Features
- discord: Add guild segmentation, DM support and context enrichment - by @skyline624 in https://github.com/moeru-ai/airi/issues/942 (2a801)
- stage-ui, stage-web: Add loading state for authing - by @luoling8192 (f8b63)
üêû Bug Fixes
- Add smooth control multiplier to VRM X axis slider - by @lockrush-dev in https://github.com/moeru-ai/airi/issues/946 (019cc)
- airi-plugin-vscode: Should not use any dependencies in vscode plugin package - by @nekomeowww (e3b37)
- docker: Server dockerfile - by @luoling8192 (b34f7)
- electron-screen-capture: Module not found on stage-tamagotchi start - by @sumimakito in https://github.com/moeru-ai/airi/issues/952 (73d33)
- stage-layout: Missing back button - by @nekomeowww in https://github.com/moeru-ai/airi/issues/950 (aeeb7)
- stage-ui, stage-web: Oauth loading state - by @luoling8192 (73455)
Full Changelog: https://github.com/moeru-ai/airi/compare/v0.8.1-beta.11...v0.8.1-beta.12
